job.title: Software Engineer - Remote
job.description: pOur client has 2 large projects and is looking for Software Engineers to help support themppbrppnbspppstronguWHAT YOULL DOnbspustrongpulliBuild solutions that meet our customers needs and are maintainable costeffective and responsiveliliPartner with our product design and infrastructure teams to build or enhance applications and servicesnbspliliOwn the reliability of the application and services by partnering operations and infrastructure to build scale and monitor services and applicationsliliDesign develop test debug and maintain software code for our highperformance business applicationsliliAnalyze and optimize User Interface and Backend Application code for efficiencyliulpbrppstronguWHAT YOULL NEEDustrongpulliAt least 5 years of professional experience building highperformance reliable systems in a complex multitiered and distributed environmentliliDesign and implement services in a variety of programming languages including Nodejs GolangliliSuccessful deployment of production code at scaleliliProven track record of writing maintainable code which includes unit tests readable code and decent implementations of design patternsliliExpertise with learning new technologies and familiarity with our tech stack JavaScript Nodejs Go Reactjs ElasticSearch NSQ GraphQL and PostgresliulpbrppTo schedule an interview with our recruiter please visit  httpscalendlycomlaurenjessupvaconeedsp
